description: Unified dashboard for monitoring AgentGateway (OSS & Enterprise) - AI Gateway with rate limiting, content guardrails, and MCP support. Enhanced with organized metrics sections: Core GenAI metrics (all requests), Streaming metrics (requires stream=true), and Model-specific breakdowns.

options.content:
| Model | Input (per 1M tokens) | Output (per 1M tokens) |
|-------|----------------------|------------------------|
| mock-gpt-4o | $${gpt4o_input_price} | $${gpt4o_output_price} |
| mock-gpt-5-2 | $${gpt52_input_price} | $${gpt52_output_price} |
| gpt-4o-mini-* | $${gpt4omini_input_price} | $${gpt4omini_output_price} |

_Update prices using the variables at the top of the dashboard._

Reference: [OpenAI Pricing](https://platform.openai.com/docs/pricing)

targets.expr:
(
  (sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="input", gen_ai_response_model="mock-gpt-4o"}[1h])) or vector(0)) * $gpt4o_input_price / 1000000 +
  (sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="output", gen_ai_response_model="mock-gpt-4o"}[1h])) or vector(0)) * $gpt4o_output_price / 1000000 +
  (sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="input", gen_ai_response_model=~"mock-gpt-5.2"}[1h])) or vector(0)) * $gpt52_input_price / 1000000 +
  (sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="output", gen_ai_response_model=~"mock-gpt-5.2"}[1h])) or vector(0)) * $gpt52_output_price / 1000000 +
  (sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="input", gen_ai_response_model=~"gpt-4o-mini-.*"}[1h])) or vector(0)) * $gpt4omini_input_price / 1000000 +
  (sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="output", gen_ai_response_model=~"gpt-4o-mini-.*"}[1h])) or vector(0)) * $gpt4omini_output_price / 1000000
) * 3600

(
  (sum(increase(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="input", gen_ai_response_model="mock-gpt-4o"}[24h])) or vector(0)) * $gpt4o_input_price / 1000000 +
  (sum(increase(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="output", gen_ai_response_model="mock-gpt-4o"}[24h])) or vector(0)) * $gpt4o_output_price / 1000000 +
  (sum(increase(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="input", gen_ai_response_model=~"mock-gpt-5.2"}[24h])) or vector(0)) * $gpt52_input_price / 1000000 +
  (sum(increase(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="output", gen_ai_response_model=~"mock-gpt-5.2"}[24h])) or vector(0)) * $gpt52_output_price / 1000000 +
  (sum(increase(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="input", gen_ai_response_model=~"gpt-4o-mini-.*"}[24h])) or vector(0)) * $gpt4omini_input_price / 1000000 +
  (sum(increase(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="output", gen_ai_response_model=~"gpt-4o-mini-.*"}[24h])) or vector(0)) * $gpt4omini_output_price / 1000000
)

(
  (sum(increase(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="input", gen_ai_response_model="mock-gpt-4o"}[7d])) or vector(0)) * $gpt4o_input_price / 1000000 +
  (sum(increase(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="output", gen_ai_response_model="mock-gpt-4o"}[7d])) or vector(0)) * $gpt4o_output_price / 1000000 +
  (sum(increase(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="input", gen_ai_response_model=~"mock-gpt-5.2"}[7d])) or vector(0)) * $gpt52_input_price / 1000000 +
  (sum(increase(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="output", gen_ai_response_model=~"mock-gpt-5.2"}[7d])) or vector(0)) * $gpt52_output_price / 1000000 +
  (sum(increase(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="input", gen_ai_response_model=~"gpt-4o-mini-.*"}[7d])) or vector(0)) * $gpt4omini_input_price / 1000000 +
  (sum(increase(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="output", gen_ai_response_model=~"gpt-4o-mini-.*"}[7d])) or vector(0)) * $gpt4omini_output_price / 1000000
)

(
    (sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="input", gen_ai_response_model="mock-gpt-4o"}[24h])) or vector(0)) * $gpt4o_input_price / 1000000 +
    (sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="output", gen_ai_response_model="mock-gpt-4o"}[24h])) or vector(0)) * $gpt4o_output_price / 1000000 +
    (sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="input", gen_ai_response_model=~"mock-gpt-5.2"}[24h])) or vector(0)) * $gpt52_input_price / 1000000 +
    (sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="output", gen_ai_response_model=~"mock-gpt-5.2"}[24h])) or vector(0)) * $gpt52_output_price / 1000000 +
    (sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="input", gen_ai_response_model=~"gpt-4o-mini-.*"}[24h])) or vector(0)) * $gpt4omini_input_price / 1000000 +
    (sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="output", gen_ai_response_model=~"gpt-4o-mini-.*"}[24h])) or vector(0)) * $gpt4omini_output_price / 1000000
  ) * 3600 * 24 * 30

panels.title: Average Cost Per 1M Requests (Input) by Model
Average Cost Per 1M Requests (Output) by Model

targets.expr:
(
  (sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="input", gen_ai_response_model="mock-gpt-4o"}[$__rate_interval])) or vector(0)) * $gpt4o_input_price / 1000000 +
  (sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="output", gen_ai_response_model="mock-gpt-4o"}[$__rate_interval])) or vector(0)) * $gpt4o_output_price / 1000000
) / sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_server_request_duration_count{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_response_model="mock-gpt-4o"}[$__rate_interval])) * 1000000

(
  (sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="input", gen_ai_response_model=~"mock-gpt-5.2"}[$__rate_interval])) or vector(0)) * $gpt52_input_price / 1000000 +
  (sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="output", gen_ai_response_model=~"mock-gpt-5.2"}[$__rate_interval])) or vector(0)) * $gpt52_output_price / 1000000
) / sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_server_request_duration_count{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_response_model=~"mock-gpt-5.2"}[$__rate_interval])) * 1000000

(
  (sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="input", gen_ai_response_model=~"gpt-4o-mini-.*"}[$__rate_interval])) or vector(0)) * $gpt4omini_input_price / 1000000 +
  (sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_token_type="output", gen_ai_response_model=~"gpt-4o-mini-.*"}[$__rate_interval])) or vector(0)) * $gpt4omini_output_price / 1000000
) / sum(rate(agentgateway_gen_ai_server_request_duration_count{namespace=~"$namespace", gen_ai_response_model=~"gpt-4o-mini-.*"}[$__rate_interval])) * 1000000

panels.title: Average Cost Per 1M Requests (Total) by Model

targets.expr:
sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"agentgateway-.*", cpu="total"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod)
/
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"agentgateway-.*", resource="cpu"}) by (pod)
* 100

panels.title: Agentgateway Proxy CPU Utilization vs Requests (%)
Agentgateway Proxy Memory Utilization vs Requests (%)

list.description: For OSS Agentgateway, select 'OSS'. All selections must match to work properly. Default: Enterprise
list.label: Proxy Deployment Naming Pattern
list.name: proxy_pod_pattern

list.description: For OSS Agentgateway, select 'OSS'. All selections must match to work properly. Default: Enterprise
list.label: Control Plane Deployment Naming Pattern
list.name: control_plane_deployment

list.description: Filters out Enterprise add-on deployments for accurate control plane/proxy metrics. Must match your deployment type above. For OSS Agentgateway, select 'OSS'. All selections must match to work properly. Default: Enterprise
list.label: Enterprise Add-on Exclusion Pattern
list.name: deployment_exclusion

title: AgentGateway Dashboard
